textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Heidi Klein co-founders Heidi Gosman and Penny Klein were inspired to open the doors to their iconic London shop in 2002, after recognizing the frustration that comes from assembling a holiday wardrobe outside of the usual summer months. Known for using luxurious fabrics that perform as effortlessly on the beach as they do for an evening out, Heidi Klein infuses each new collection with bold prints and neutral tones, seamlessly mixing classic silhouettes with each season's must-have items. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime members, free two-day shipping
